bio.name: Michel Moreau
bio.welcomeMessage:
I am Michel and I am pleased to have you here.

I would describe me as someone who strives to think about, improve, and create things that could bring value to people and humanity. I try to meet this goal by constantly reading books, learning autonomously and methodically, as well as taking part in research projects of different kind.

Outside of work, I also love playing basketball and soccer, backpacking, hiking, and laughing a lot.

Please reach out to me if you think I can help for something.

Enjoy the surfing!
